column5: Hi all,  Here's the situation. A fellow OFNer (sorry no names) has invited me to go out Salmon fishing and he said that I need some waders and other stuff to go. I can get the other stuff but I don't have waders and I wasn't planning on purchasing any until next year. I'm moving to first house soon so money is tight right now. If anyone knows where I could get a set for REALLY cheap or borrow (I live in Oshawa) then I would appreciate it. I really want to go Salmon fishing. I'm not sure how you measure them but I wear a size 12 shoe if it helps.  Thanks for any info.
Hey Smokingall4s, I have an extra pair of neoprene chest waders in large that you may borrow. I'm in Markham. PM me if you're interested.
Awwwwwwww.  That's just so sweet.  Youse guys are the best.
